author: minfrin
msg: Fix a potential segfault if the bind password in the LDAP cache
Reviewed by:	jim, trawick, bnicholes, minfrin

author: minfrin
msg: Quotes cannot be used around require group and require dn
directives, update the documentation to reflect this. Also add
quotes around the dn and group within debug messages, to make it
more obvious why authentication is failing if quotes are used in
Reviewed by:	minfrin, jim, trawick, bnicholes

author: minfrin
msg: The Microsoft LDAP SDK escapes filters for us, stop util_ldap
from escaping filters twice when the backslash character is used.
Reviewed by:	minfrin, jim, trawick, bnicholes
